p: I) Oils containing large amounts of erucic acid. Erucic acid is a monounsaturated omega-9 fatty acid that has been evidenced for its long-term health risk such as myocardial lipidosis especially in children up to ten years [ 21]. The oils in this groups include Chinese mustard seed oil, Chinese cabbage seed oil, broccoli seed oil, false Pak Choi (Inthanon) seed oil, green Pak Choi seed oil, false Pak Choi (Phukeaw) seed oil, cauliflower seed oil, Chinese kale seed oil, flowering Pak Choi (1) seed oil, Hong Kong Chinese kale seed oil, Indian mustard seed oil, Chinese radish seed oil, Chinese green mustard seed oil, curly kale seed oil, rat-tailed radish seed oil, flowering Pak Choi (2) seed oil, and Chinese flowering cabbage seed oil.
